satisfaction.label: How did this procedure go for you?

easy.label: According to the following answers, what best describes you:

options.label: The procedure was easy to complete
The procedure was neither easy nor difficult to complete
The procedure was difficult to complete

comprehension.label: What did you think of the language used?

options.label: Neither easy nor difficult to understand
I lacked information before starting the procedure
The site did not display well on mobile
There was missing information about the follow-up of my request or procedure (deadline, etc.)

difficulties_details_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other difficulties you encountered?

contact.label: Did you try to contact the responsible help service for the procedure?

options.label: Yes, but I couldn't find how to contact them

contact_reached.label: Did you manage to reach them?

contact_channels.label: By what means did you try to contact the procedure service?

contact_channels_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other means you tried to contact the service with?

contact_details.label: Did you manage to reach them?

options.label: I couldn't figure out how to contact them
I contacted them but couldn't reach them
I contacted them and they responded

contact_satisfaction.label: How did the exchange with the procedure service go?

help.label: Did you need additional help for this procedure?

options.label: I asked for help from a family member or friend
I asked for help from an association

help_details_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other help you needed?

verbatim.label: Would you like to tell us more?
verbatim.hint: Do not provide any personal information here. This is not a contact form. If you have questions about this procedure, contact the relevant service.
